dialog.title: Import {{type}} proxies
dialog.description: Paste your proxies here, one per line

checkDialog.title: Check Proxies
checkDialog.description: You are about to check {{count}} proxies. Invalid proxies will be removed automatically.

listImportToast.someFailed: Imported {{count}} accounts, failed to import {{failed}} accounts

generate.title: Generate Offline Accounts
generate.description: Generate offline Java accounts with a custom name format.
generate.nameFormatHelp: Use %d as a placeholder for the account number (e.g., Bot_%d becomes Bot_1, Bot_2, etc.)
generate.modeHelp:
Choose how to handle existing accounts:

• Ignore Existing: Only generates accounts with names that don't already exist. Keeps all existing accounts unchanged.

• Replace Existing: Generates all accounts, replacing any existing accounts that have the same UUID. Other accounts are kept.

• Replace All: Deletes ALL existing accounts and replaces them with the generated accounts.
generate.allExist: All usernames already exist. Enable 'Override existing accounts' to regenerate them.
generate.invalidAmount: Please enter a valid amount (at least 1)

dialog.title: Import {{type}} accounts
dialog.description: Paste your accounts here, one per line

config.description: Configure per-bot settings for this account
config.noSettings: No settings available for this page

bots.noBots: No bots configured. Add accounts from the Account Settings page.
